mesquite.lib

Class TreeDisplayDrawnExtra

  • java.lang.Object
    • mesquite.lib.TreeDisplayExtra
      • mesquite.lib.TreeDisplayDrawnExtra
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listable, OwnedByModule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TraceCharacterOperator

    public abstract class TreeDisplayDrawnExtra
extends TreeDisplayExtra
    A subclass of TreeDisplayExtra. Used only so that tree drawing knows that these are drawn above the tree and can be reordered..
